title: Star Wars Galaxy of Heroes v0.3.121192 mods
description:
Collect your favorite Star Wars characters, like Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Darth Vader, and more, from every era â€“ then conquer your opponents in epic, RPG-style combat. Build mighty teams and craft the best strategy to win battles across iconic locations to become the most legendary hologamer in the galaxy. You can also unlock new characters like Rey and Kylo Ren from Star Warsâ„¢: The Force Awakensâ„¢ and put them on your team!

CREATE YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM
Build powerful light and dark side teams with heroes and other characters from the Star Wars universe. Make strategic choices and pick characters with complimentary abilities to construct squads like never before!

COLLECT ICONIC HEROES
Collect characters from the original trilogy and prequel films, animated TV shows like Star Warsâ„¢: The Clone Warsâ„¢ and Star Wars Rebelsâ„¢ â€“ and even Star Wars: The Force Awakens!

TRAIN POWERFUL CHAMPIONS
Make tactical decisions and equip your heroes with powerful gear to enhance their damage. Unlock special leader abilities to buff your team and unleash moves like Darth Sidiousâ€™s Force Lightning, Chewbaccaâ€™s Wookiee Rage, and more.

MASTER THE STRATEGY
Feel the excitement of beating opponents in epic battles as you master the galactic hologames in a far off cantina. Heroes will need to upgrade their powerful attacks and unique abilities to take down other squads in Squad Cantina Battles and the PvP Squad Arena for galactic greatness. Create the ultimate strategy to collect and conquer.

FIGHT IN LEGENDARY LOCATIONS
Complete epic missions on Hoth, Bespin, Tatooine, Coruscant, and beyond. Unlock special characters to play through in light and dark side campaigns.

What's new:
Get ready for the exclusive limited-time Grand Masterâ€™s Training event in our latest update, which includes:
â€¢ The only way to obtain the powerful Grand Master Yoda for one week each month
â€¢ The Shard Shop: Trade in extra Shards towards other characters

Thanks for playing!

Installation Instructions:

NON-Root users - Will have to play as guest.

1. Click and download the "Signed" mod below.
2. Install the downloaded APK.

Root users - Allows Google Play andlogin.

1. Install Clean APK or Google Play Version - 0.3.121192
2. Launch the game and login with your Google Play account
3. Close Clean APK or Play Store Version and download the Modded "Unsigned" APK
4. Install Lucky Patcher (you need to do this only once If you haven't done it already), give it root permissions and go to toolbox. Scroll down until you find "Patch to Android" tap it. Check the first 2 boxes and apply.
5. Now install the Modded Unsigned APK over Clean APK or Play Store version
6. Launch the game and it will log you into Google Play.

The mod will not work if it is installed on a google version.
Requirements: Android 4.1+
